homeHeroText: P4 Review App helps teams manage code reviews efficiently and stay informed with important news and updates.
homeKeyFeaturesSlogan: Everything you need to ship better code, faster and safer
homeKeyFeaturesText:
P4 Review App offers a range of features designed to enhance your
 code review experience and keep your team connected.
cardOneText: Send and manage code review requests quickly and easily.
cardTwoText: Stay up-to-date with important news, announcements, and updates from your team.
cardThreeText: Promote collaboration and communication within your team through integrated review tools.
